WELCOME_MESSAGE:
Welcome to Flashit! 

To start, do a search on FlashIt engine, if you get any good results, copy the code left on the search bar and paste it here, i will notify you if there is new results for you! 

Hit /help to learn more on how to use Flashit.
WAIT_MESSAGE: Wait few seconds, Flashit is processing...
GIVE_LOCATION_MESSAGE:
Mind give me your location?
Please make sure you have Enable the Location in your device!

SHARE_CONTACT_MESSAGE:
Hi!

HELP_MESSAGE:
Hi, here's how to use Flashit Bot: 

> /start - For the presentation of Flashit. 
> /help - To get more explanation of how to use it. 

If you still have a problem, please contact the developer @sanixdarker.
REQUEST_TOO_LONG: Your request is too long, reduce it!
OUPS_URL_MESSAGE: Oups! An error occured with your code(allready used or not valid):
CODE_SAVED_MESSAGE: Your code have been saved successfully, you will be notify soon for this request !
